0010101010000001 1011100010000001 1 -> sum: 1110001100000011, cout: 0
1010110100110000 1110110010010000 1 -> sum: 1001100111000001, cout: 1

0110001000010010 0001111111011000 1 -> sum: 1000000111101011, cout: 0
